pullRequest.title: Create new pull request template
pullRequest.bodyText:
We will eventually want to support different types of Pull requests (issues, docs, etc.) and GitHub supports a Template directory where many templates can be used for different kinds of PR's and can have different automation flows with query parameters.  This will be a useful starting point as we build out more automation (@ostephens docs effort) and expand our contributors.
Details here:

https://help.github.com/en/github/building-a-strong-community/about-issue-and-pull-request-templates
https://help.github.com/en/github/managing-your-work-on-github/about-automation-for-issues-and-pull-requests-with-query-parameters

commit.message:
Create new pull request template

We will eventually want to support different types of Pull requests (issues, docs, etc.) and GitHub supports a Template directory where many templates can be used for different kinds of PR's and can have different automation flows with query parameters.  This will be a useful starting point as we build out more automation (Owen's docs effort) and expand our contributors.

Details here: 
- https://help.github.com/en/github/building-a-strong-community/about-issue-and-pull-request-templates
- https://help.github.com/en/github/managing-your-work-on-github/about-automation-for-issues-and-pull-requests-with-query-parameters

nodes.bodyText: I think GitHub special keyword is Fixes #{issue_number} for automatic closing of issue. 🤔

commit.message: use only supported keyword to auto close properly
